name: Tap Toys Crush
description:
Play super collapse puzzle game and blast the cubes!

Match cubes and create powerful combos to blast toy cubes! Solve puzzles and pass levels to collect stars
and prizes! Solve the challenging puzzles, enjoy your Sweet cakes.Test your skills with hours of blasted
blocks crushing fun!Let's relax and join yourself in the big blast adventure in Tap Toys Crush.

How to play:
- Swap and match more than 2 identical toy cube to crush.
- Make special toy combos to help you crush various barriers.
- Collect the power-ups to help with the tough situation.
- Gather enough target items to win before you run out of moves.

Features:
- Tap cubes and blockers to blast!
- Powerful props like bombs that will help to crush your way to the next level!
- Simple operation & excitement challenges.
- You can play whenever and wherever.
